name: Advent Calendar
about: What it is:Â An essential, limited-edition beauty advent calendar with 24 makeup, skincare, bath, and accessory gifts to discoverâ€”including one exclusive surprise...What Else You Need to Know: The long-awaited Advent calendar is here. Unwrap the magic of 24 makeup, skincare, bath, and accessory beauty gifts from December 1st to the 24th. Discover an exclusive surprise available only in this calendar. Developed using a more responsible approach: the calendarâ€™s packaging is made from cardboard sourced from sustainably managed forests...This Set Contains:.-Love the Lift Mascara in Ultra Black.- Cleansing Wipes in Aloe.- Anti-Dark Circles Eye Masks Blueberry Extract + Anti-Fatigue Caffeine.-All Day Hydrator-Hydrate +Glow.- Bubble Bath & Shower Gel monoÃ¯.- Lip Mask in Cherry Extract.-Nose Strip Blackhead Remover.- Brightening Eye Cream.- Clean Skin Gel.- 2 x Nail Polish in 101 and 202.- Top Coat Polish.- Lip Marker in 02 Make it Loud.- Lip Liner To Go in 03 Classic Red.- 12H Retractable Eyeliner Waterproof in 10 matte brown.- Coconut Foot Masks

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-The boxes in the 2024 Advent calendar are numbered from 1 to 24, each corresponding to a day in December. Just open the door with the dayâ€™s date to discover the hidden surprise. The adventure begins on December 1 and ends on Christmas Eve, December 24.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There is a lot of amazing products in here that were worth my buy! It was only $34.00 with a $179 value! Buy this if you love the Sephora collection!

reviews.review_title: January arrival and repeat from last year
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Arrived in January when ordered in November. Only Sephora didnâ€™t accommodate the postal strike. All other companies did.  Very similar products to last yearâ€™s calendar. Most were repeats. Last year they had a link to show a video on how to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was so cute, and the items really brought my attention to Sephora products. Just testing each out whenever I remember it. So far I love the lash lift. It stays with some primer sprays but it does smudge. But it works so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So much fun to open! Great value when bought on sale! Worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The calendar was in a very pretty box, however for the price we felt the surprises were not up to par, would have liked to have seen more Sephora items, for example one of the items was a chapstick in a Sephora wrapper., nail polish, a nail file, face mask. Would have just like to have seen maybe perfume samples or something like make up samples. Will be looking for a different one for next year .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was so much fun to open with a surprise each day. I couldnâ€™t believe what they managed to put into this box! I appreciated the variety of the samples, and really enjoyed the experience.
Didnâ€™t like the calendar it was $50 and had face mask and stickers not worth the money.  I was so disappointed and felt so bad that my daughter got all the cheap products.

reviews.review_title: Great advent calendar for beauty product lovers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the sparkly and colourful box, easy to open compartments and all the products are lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For all those people saying that 11 was missing CHECK YOUR BOXES!!!! I thought it was missing too but I found it after I ripped it up for recycling!! Generally awesome product! Love the lip marker

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Each year I purchase an Advent Calendar. This years was the best one so far. Every item is something that I will use. The nail polishes are full size, I have already used them. I like the top coat too. The face masks are great, those alone would be the price of the whole calendar . The tweezers are very good quality and I was surprised to get such a great item. The under eye de-puffer is amazing Iâ€™m happy I received it. The silver hair scrunchy is super cute and the lip gloss is a nice soft shade of red. I love this calendar this year!!! Thank you Sephora you never disappoint. too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: not 1 useful product. I was happy that there will a eyeliner but no, that also has to be a dry one. I'll never buy this sephora brand again.
Was missing 2 of the days completely from the calendar
Toutes les produits dans chaques cases y Ã©tait, vraiment bon prix pour Ã§a, je suis contente des produits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift and felt bad for the person who bought this for me. Most of the products are just samples! Samples we receive for free at Sephora! Definitely not worth it...the worst top 24 were put in this box...tells you exactly how what Sephora thinks of its customers.....  Seriously, quite insulting...

Iâ€™m disappointed with this product. The mascara was dry, the creams smelled like they were years old, and everything felt outdated. Even the eyeliner pencil was so dry that it was impossible to apply. I do not recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a fun advent calendar!! Iâ€™m in love with the lil marker and disappointed I canâ€™t find more colors anywhere, really hope to find more lil markers soon!!

reviews.review_title: The best part is the packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was lovely to receive as a gift, as the fun of it is opening each perforated box to discover what's inside. It's as exciting as unwrapping any gift. Product-wise, it's not so great, as the Sephora website promotes this item as valued at $132 and offers it for $50. The items inside do not even add up to $50!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed with the advent calendar. Not good quality products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not good very poor ,  overpriced,  and nothing good in

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Products were basic, cheap and not thrilling. Could have been better.
I was so disappointed with this advent calendar. It was a gift for my teenage daughter and there was only one thing that was useful. I definitely wouldnâ€™t recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not good. Products very small and for the price you do not get enough stuff. You can buy everything in here for most 20$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was disappointing as far as advent calendars go. Only trial sizes of products. With so many makeup brands coming out with bigger calendars I would love if Sephora did (at a higher price point). This one would be great for tweets ans teens.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was fantastic! My girls loved it and ended up with a slew of great products. Will prob purchase again next year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this advent calender 50 dollars might be alot for some people but I got it 30% off! I really recommend for adults or tweens!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was the most disappointing advent calendar ever. Very cheap for the price , Definitely not worth the price

reviews.review_title: Amazing happy I got to add more to my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After I opened all these amazing products and everything and tried them out they changed my skin right away there so amazing and will always recommend these products for any skin types!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got two Sephora advent calendars for my teen daughters. They were so excited at first but were disappointed day after day with the items. Would not recommend for teens.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was missing items. My daughter was really sad to open and have empty spots, I was annoyed I paid that much to have missing products

reviews.review_title: I want to buy more of whatâ€™s in the calendar!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the calendar, but both times Iâ€™ve gotten it my favorite item is not for sale on the website. This year itâ€™s the Day 24 Lip Marker. Itâ€™s not listed on the website and Iâ€™d love to buy more colors of it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend got me one and honestly a lot bad options within it, the masks are great but the red lipstick is crap (thatâ€™s the surprise witch is terrible). For how much they charge this is ridiculous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my 14 year old daughter & 2 of the doors have been empty so not worth $50

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My daughter likes shopping at Sephora so purchased this for her. Day 11 was missing and we contacted customer support which was really helpful. I tried to see if it fell but couldn't see anything. Day 23 was also missing something but because most of empty now we could see that it had fallen to the bottom, which then we were able to see Day 11 also had actually fallen to the bottom. So was happy to see it was just a packaging issue and not missing items. Overall she was happy with everything. There were a few items she wont use but have to say it overall was good. We did pay full price as I bought it early as well, so buying it cheaper would of been a deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The calendar was missing multiple days. we checked to make sure they didn't fall down the buttom and they did not. Based on the price you pay for this and the sample sizes you get, all 24 should be there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: sad to say opening 22 today, it was empty. What a bummer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift from my parents and I really enjoyed this calendar. on the first day I got the mascara which i have been wanting for so long, it is so good, there are a variety of face masks and nail stuff which i was really happy with and there was some skincare and body care stuff. I would say the nly things I did not like would be the hair scrunci, eye roller and lip marker. The tweezers did fall through so I had to look hard for those. I have already used the nail polish multiple times and they are really good. I am really bad at painting my nails and find that it just gets all over and looks streaky but this stuff looks really nice on my nails. I wish sephora sold nail polish still.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My daughters and I have been so disappointed in this â€¦ there was no makeup - so far an eyeliner. Wonâ€™t be purchasing again.

Au dÃ©but, jâ€™Ã©tais vraiment contente du calendrier de lâ€™Avent Mais je me suis rendu compte quâ€™elle y avait deux casse qui manquaient un produit., il nâ€™y avait pas de produit dans la classe 12 et 23.
This Advent Calendar is total disappointment for my teenage daughter. Do not recommend

reviews.review_title: Fun idea but sadly needs revamping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got one of these last year and absolutely loved it and the products I received. This year the box is quite flimsy so when I open a date it dislodges other 'gifts' that rattle around underneath. Also, the 'gifts' are somewhat inexpensive and non-inspiring. I have yet to find a mascara, cologne sample, mini-eyeshadow or something of interest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Its so cool how it has multiple products for each need. I would recommend maybe making the products a bit bigger or include popular brands

This review is for the premium 24 day adven calendar.  Was full of cheap Sephora brand products. My daughter was so disappointed that I bought the elf calendar which was much better. This calendar looks like the same products. Just half of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super fun and cute! Will purchase again next year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the advent calendar and mostly have been liking a new product daily except when the day is empty. I'm not sure who packed the boxes but I don't recommend gifting this with products missing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift from my mom who was so excited to give me an advent calendar from sephora â€œbecause they sell makeup!â€ While she couldâ€™ve looked further to see the products that come with this - which is clearly advertised - iâ€™m sure she wouldâ€™ve considered this a waste of money as much as I did. Majority of this advent calendar looks like someone shopped through the travel section at target. The skincare products are the equivalent of a free sample size youâ€™d receive with a regular purchase from a makeup store. The package was also made really poorly. About 5 days worth of items appeared to be missing before I realized they fell out of their box and to the bottom. I had to rip apart the box just to find some because theyâ€™d wedged between pieces of cardboard.  Sure itâ€™s â€œonlyâ€ $50, but I think everyone can agree that $50 is a lot of money in this economy right now. I wouldnâ€™t really recommend buying this for anyone unless they specifically ask for it. Minus the few makeup items, you may as well go to a dollar general and buy the same items.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There were multiple products missing, and no they hadnâ€™t fallen out of the holders.

reviews.review_title: Compared to previous year's advent calendar....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally look forward to and love the Sephora Advent calendar.  This year's version is just so-so.  Nail stickers are a hard pass and they look cheap. The eye roller product, no instructions.  2 nail files, also a pass. I'm on day 16 and I'm not really wowed.  Will think twice about ordering next year.
My daughter and I were super excited to open her calendar each day and share in the enthusiasm that came with each little gift. We were so disappointed to find out that Day 11 was missing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No.11 isnâ€™t missing.  The item is a nail polish and it just inside the box.  It fell off the holder
This was for my daughter. Products up to now or so-so. Day 11 was empty!!! Not happy about this at all. I would skip this advent calendar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnâ€™t get a lot of stuff that I wanted and wasnâ€™t really worth the price

reviews.review_title: No Santa Claus this year, darling!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At least you guys received yours! This Advent Calendar was the first thing my daughter asked for - for Christmas this year and she was so excited about it! It was SOLD OUT at every mall near me so I ordered it online on Nov. 21st with my fingers crossed that it might arrive during the first week of December - because it's an Advent Calendar - for December! Why Sephora decided to ship it via Canada Post while they are on STRIKE is beyond me! So... her Christmas present is sitting at a Canada Post office somewhere... until who knows when...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This advent calendar is not worth the money. Sample size products. For the price I would have expected at least a few, if not all, full size products given they are Sephora brands.
Not worth it. Only half way through and itâ€™s already missing a day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There are good products in here for teens she loves it!

I can rate this product correct because unfortunately Sephora is still delivering with Canada post , so my order has not arrived and itâ€™s still sitting in Ontario and I am in Nova Scotia.  Sephora knew of the strike so it is really bad business that they shipped gifts with canada post.

reviews.review_title: Missing 3 products and it is only Day 12!
reviews.review_text: So disappointing. It's Dec 12th and our calendar was missing the products from Dec 10, 11, and 12. All three were completely empty.  I called customer service but they won't refund because we purchased > 60 days ago (we purchased early b/c they sell out so quickly).
Bought one for me and one for my Mom â€¦ weâ€™re both missing Day 11 !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Day 11 no gift my daughter is disappointed to say the least so am I.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very dispointed , today is day 11 and 3 spots were empty. Never again. I liked Sephora but this is creating a bad reputation for them
I am very disappointed in this product that I purchased for my daughter. There is no product in the 11 spot. She opened this afternoon and it was empty.

I purchased this product for my daughter. I always get an Advent Calendar each year for my daughter and this was the 1st year of my getting her one from Sephora. I was very disappointed in this product.  I don't feel as though the contents was worth what I paid for this product. Needless to say, my daughter was also very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible! Cheap travel size products not even worth $1.62 each. So far my daughter was missing day 7 and day 11. Customer service credited me $3.24. Did not offer to ship the missing items which she was hoping. What an

I am missing day 11 and trying to call the upper Canada mall location and they refuse to pick up. This is not the first time Iâ€™ve bought from Sephora and thing have either been missing or empty this is extremely inappropriate and  unprofessional a billion dollar company should be able to serve consumers with a half decent product .  is highTh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Most disappointing advent calendar Iâ€™ve bought in my life. Both number 7 and 11 have been empty for me so far, and I looked in the bottom to see if it fell through- it didnâ€™t. I wanted to spend my money on something worth it, and obviously Sephora was the wrong choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this advent calendar for my 10-year-old daughter. All of the products have been super cute and useful however, today day 11 was EMPTY. Very disappointed. My daughter looks forward to opening up her advent calendar every morning and to find day 11 empty was very upsetting. ï¿¼
My daughter looks forward to opening every morning before Christmas.  This morning day 11 was empty.  very disappointing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was so excited to actually order this and totally disappointed..Totally waste of money.  I purchased another advent calendar from tiktok the same day for $15 and that one is 20xs better. For the amount of money spent, I should be having products not found at the dollar store. I'm on day 10 and its gotten to the point where I really wish I could return bc it's not even fun.

I wish I could give it 0 stars for the lack of effort Sephora put in this year. $179 value, I think they meant $17.90 value. 10 days in and itâ€™s masks, and one day was stickersâ€¦ who wants stickers? Sephora should refund everyone who bought this garbage.
I would not buy this again. The products are terrible & things my daughter would never use. Donâ€™t waste your money
